text: It’s really easy to roll your own custom slide in’s using intersection observer and anime.js if youre interested. I love using anime.js for just about any animations that I need. Pretty versatile, easy to pick up, and light. I’ve got it baked into my theme. With global watchers, and global settings for modules so each module can be consistent.
Have you provided a name? "You need to provide a name for this SITE_PAGE."

We have an issue on a client HS CMS where the Cookie banner is NOT activated, but still banner.js is requested from the server (202 kb).

I’m not sure that banner.js should load when the HS cookie banner is disabled in the settings? We would indeed like it not to.
